message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item valued at $10,000 by you, at a competitive price. I believe this offer will be beneficial for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity but $12,000 is still a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.
